Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Critical
b) Defect Observed: Connector corrosion causing signal degradation. Defect found during scheduled
maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Emergency Power component.
Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Replace entire assembly due to extent of damage
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 10/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. P.L. Mehta
